name: Arctovish
description: Though it’s able to capture prey by freezing its surroundings, it has trouble eating the prey afterward because its mouth is on top of its head.

attacks.name: Hard Face
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, this Pokémon takes 60 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Cold Breath
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Asleep.
